ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker

Class StateSpinner

  • java.lang.Object
    • Spinner
      • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.StateSpinner

  • public class StateSpinner
extends Spinner
    The StateSpinner extends the Spinner class and just adds the functionality of being able to check if the spinner has been opened or if it has not been opened.
    Author:
    Team3ScandalouStopwatch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StateSpinner(Context context)
      Constructor that has the additional functionality of setting the spinnerOpened status to false when created as it has not been opened yet
